posts.title: react hook学习
posts.text: react hooks学习倒计时demo 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';function CounterButton() { const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [isIncrementing, setIsIncrementing] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { let interval; if (isIncrementing) { interval = setInterval(() => { setCount(prevCount => prevCount + 1); }, 1000); } else { clearInterval(interval); } return () => { clearInterval(interval); }; }, [isIncrementing]); const toggleIncrementing = () => { setIsIncrementing(!isIncrementing); }; return ( <div> <p>Count: {count}</p> <button onClick={toggleIncrementing}> {isIncrementing ? 'Stop Incrementing' : 'Start Incrementing'} </button> </div> );}export default CounterButton; 效果如图，这里面使用了usetate,useeffect
